description: Since 1869, Crescent Lufkin® has stood at the forefront of measuring tools and equipment, with industy-leading quality and innovation. meta_title: LUFKIN HV1425D 1X25 ENGINEERS TAPE HI-VIZ
description: Since 1869 Lufkin has been manufacturing and supplying top-quality measuring tools with very high accuracy. True to their reputation, the Hi-Viz series power return tape measure is precise in its measurements and durable in its materials and design. Designed to fit perfectly into your hand, the closed case is made from super-strong, lightweight, ABS plastic that has an eye-catching color so it's easy to find. The 1" wide yellow blade is made of steel with a clear coat for excellent visibility. The numerals are in a clear, easy-to-read font. This engineer's tape has the A4 style blade. It is 33' (10.06m) long with 2 sets of graduations. On the top edge the measurements are given in ft/10ths/100ths, while the bottom edge is graduated by ft/in/16ths. This tape measure is a self-rewind with its power return. There is a special cushion for the blade return so as to prevent injury. It also has a toggle lock feature so that you don't have the blade return while reading. As added benefits, there is a virtually unbreakable quad hook at the end of the blade, and a convenient, removable belt hook.
summary: Easy to find Small enough to fit in your hand Lightweight Easy-to-read blade Toggle lock Extra durable Cushioned for blade power return Removable belt clip Measures inches/10ths/100ths
meta_keyword: LUFKIN HV1425D 1X25 ENGINEERS TAPE HI-VIZ

meta_title: LUFKIN L1035MAG 1-3/16X35 COMMAND SERIES MAGNETIC TAPE MEASURE DUAL S
description: The Crescent Lufkin® L1000 Command Series tapes are a line of tough tape measures for the professional user. Their design is compact, comfortable, and are our most durable tape family. The nylon-coated yellow-clad blade has large, easy-to-read markings on both sides of the tape, allowing you to see measurements from all angles, and boasts a 10-foot standout. The 4-rivet magnetic dual end hook grips on all sides and makes marking and measuring significantly easier. The tape has a rugged rubber over-mold for increased impact resistance.
summary: 1-3/16" x 35' L1000 Command Series Magnetic Yellow Clad Dual Sided Tape Measure Compact case designed for improved ergonomics 1-3/16" dual sided blade with a vertical read on the back side Consecutive graduation of inches to 16ths on both sides, with a vertical and a horizontal read out 10-foot standout for longer reach and efficient measuring 360° magnetic end hook grips on all sides to make marking and measuring easier Nylon-coated, anti-glare blade protection prolongs the life of the blade Rugged rubber over-mold housing has a 5-screw construction for increased impact resistance Strong magnet on end hook for convenience Tether point for safely working at height
meta_keyword: LUFKIN L1035MAG 1-3/16X35 COMMAND SERIES MAGNETIC TAPE MEASURE DUAL S

meta_title: LUFKIN L1125 1-3/16X25 SHOCKFORCE TAPE METAL GUARDRAILS FOR LOCK BUTTO
description: Introducing the toughest tapes to ever hit a jobsite. Shockforce brings new meaning to the term high performance with a full 14 Ft. of standout and the ability to survive a 100 Ft. drop onto solid concrete. Add in a diamond coated 360-degree end hook that delivers 50% more gripping power, a two-sided blade with vertical markings on the back, and class-leading ergonomics and you have a tape that’s destined to be the new standard for trade professionals.

summary: Diamond-coated end hook grabs material from every direction and prevents slippage Narrow blade technology offers reduced weight when carrying a tape all day on the job site Matte nylon blade provides extended product life and glare reduction Optimized drum and spring design provides a compact case design that fits comfortably in the palm of your hand Survives a 100' drop for real life, on the job durability Dual-sided blade print with vertical quick read scale on underside for overhead and hard to reach measurements 14 feet of unassisted standout Steel tether point offers increased safety capability when working at height Steel tether point can also be used for scribing and drawing arcs during layout

meta_title: LUFKIN TX46N 5/8X6 FOLDING WOOD RULE RED END
description: Since 1869, Crescent Lufkin® has stood at the forefront of measuring tools and equipment, with industry-leading quality and innovation. We enable the consumer or professional user with reliable, precise, durable lines of products, including our wooden measuring rules. Since patenting the Lufkin Folding Rule in 1919, we've been manufacturing top-quality tools, like this rule which features brass joints, clear graduation markings on both sides and edges, and two extending slide rules.
summary: 5/8" x 6' Red End® Wood Rule with Two 6" Slide Rule Extension Graduated slide rule extends up to 6 feet Stops at each end to prevent slide from falling out Marked along both sides and both edges Graduated to 1/16ths of an inch Prop 65 compliant Durable construction features brass plated joints and brass end caps to prevent ends from splintering
meta_keyword: LUFKIN TX46N 5/8X6 FOLDING WOOD RULE RED END
